Class StockManager

java.lang.Object
  StockManager

public class StockManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manage the stock in a business. The stock is described by zero or more Products.

Version:
(a version number or a date)
Author:
(your name)

delivery

public void delivery(int id,
                     int amount)
Receive a delivery of a particular product. Increase the quantity of the product by the given amount.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the product.
amount - The amount to increase the quantity by.

findProduct

public Product findProduct(int id)
Try to find a product in the stock with the given id.

Returns:
The identified product, or null if there is none with a matching ID.

numberInStock

public int numberInStock(int id)
Locate a product with the given ID, and return how many of this item are in stock. If the ID does not match any product, return zero.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the product.
Returns:
The quantity of the given product in stock.

printProductDetails

public void printProductDetails()
Print details of all the products.
